Allspice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon cinnamon, 1/4 teaspoon ginger, and 1/4 teaspoon cloves

Baking powder.substitution: 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 teaspoon cream of tartar OR 1/4 teaspoon baking soda plus 1/2 cup buttermilk (decrease liquid in recipe by 1/2 cup)

Baking soda.substitution: 4 teaspoons baking powder OR 1 teaspoon potassium bicarbonate and 1/3 teaspoon salt. NOTE: If the recipe calls for an acidic liquid such as sour cream, yogurt, buttermilk, vinegar, molasses, or citrus juice, you should replace it with the same amount of whole milk

Beer.substitution: 1 cup nonalcoholic beer OR 1 cup chicken broth

Brandy.substitution: 1 teaspoon imitation brandy extract plus enough water to make 1/4 cup

Bread crumbs.substitution: 1 cup cracker crumbs OR 1 cup matzo meal OR 1 cup ground oats

Broth: beef or chicken.substitution: 1 bouillon cube plus 1 cup boiling water OR 1 tablespoon soy sauce plus enough water to make 1 cup OR 1 cup vegetable broth

Brown sugar.substitution: 1 cup white sugar plus 1/4 cup molasses and decrease the liquid in recipe by 1/4 cup OR 1 cup white sugar OR 1 1/4 cups confectioners' sugar

Butter (salted).substitution: 1 cup margarine OR 1 cup shortening plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup lard plus 1/2 teaspoon salt

Butter (unsalted).substitution: 1 cup shortening OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil OR 7/8 cup lard

Buttermilk.substitution: 1 cup yogurt OR 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar plus enough milk to make 1 cup

Cheddar cheese.substitution: 1 cup shredded Colby cheddar OR 1 cup shredded Monterey Jack cheese

Chicken base.substitution: 1 cup canned or homemade chicken broth or stock. Reduce liquid in recipe by 1 cup

Chocolate (semisweet).substitution: 1 (1-ounce) square of unsweetened chocolate plus 4 teaspoons sugar OR 1 ounce semisweet chocolate chips plus 1 teaspoon shortening

Chocolate (unsweetened).substitution: 3 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa plus 1 tablespoon shortening or vegetable oil

Condensed cream of mushroom soup.substitution: 1 (10.75-ounce) can condensed cream of celery, cream of chicken, or golden mushroom soup

Corn syrup.substitution: 1 1/4 cup white sugar plus 1/3 cup water OR 1 cup honey OR 1 cup light treacle syrup

Cottage cheese.substitution: 1 cup farmer's cheese OR 1 cup ricotta cheese

Cracker crumbs.substitution: 1 cup bread crumbs OR 1 cup matzo meal OR 1 cup ground oats

Cream (heavy).substitution: 1 cup evaporated milk OR 3/4 cup milk plus 1/3 cup butter

Cream (light).substitution: 1 cup evaporated milk OR 3/4 cup milk plus 3 tablespoons butter

Cr\u00e8me fraiche.substitution: Combine 1 cup of heavy cream and 1 tablespoon of plain yogurt. Let stand for 6 hours at room temperature

Egg.substitution: 2 1/2 tablespoons of powdered egg substitute plus 2 1/2 tablespoons water OR 1/4 cup liquid egg substitute OR 1/4 cup silken tofu pureed OR 3 tablespoons mayonnaise OR half a banana mashed with 1/2 teaspoon baking powder OR 1 tablespoon powdered flax seed soaked in 3 tablespoons water

Farmer's cheese.substitution: 8 ounces dry cottage cheese OR 8 ounces creamed cottage cheese, drained

Fats for baking.substitution: 1 cup applesauce OR 1 cup fruit puree

Flour: bread.substitution: 1 cup all-purpose flour plus 1 teaspoon wheat gluten

Flour: self-Rising.substitution: 7/8 cup all-purpose flour plus 1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder and 1/2 teaspoon of salt

Garlic.substitution: 1/8 teaspoon garlic powder OR 1/2 teaspoon granulated garlic OR 1/2 teaspoon garlic salt, reduce salt in recipe

Green onion.substitution: 1/2 cup chopped onion OR 1/2 cup chopped leek OR 1/2 cup chopped shallots

Hazelnuts.substitution: 1 cup macadamia nuts OR 1 cup almonds

Herbs (fresh).substitution: 1 teaspoon (chopped or whole leaf) dried herbs

Honey.substitution: 1 1/4 cup white sugar plus 1/3 cup water OR 1 cup corn syrup OR 1 cup light treacle syrup

Hot pepper sauce.substitution: 3/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper plus 1 teaspoon vinegar

Lard.substitution: 1 cup shortening OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil OR 1 cup butter

Lemon juice.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon vinegar OR 1 teaspoon white wine OR 1 teaspoon lime juice

Lemon zest.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon lemon extract OR 2 tablespoons lemon juice

Lime juice.substitution: 1 teaspoon vinegar OR 1 teaspoon white wine OR 1 teaspoon lemon juice

Margarine.substitution: 1 cup shortening plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 1 cup butter OR 7/8 cup vegetable oil plus 1/2 teaspoon salt OR 7/8 cup lard plus 1/2 teaspoon salt

Mayonnaise.substitution: 1 cup sour cream OR 1 cup plain yogurt

Milk (whole).substitution: 1 cup soy milk OR 1 cup rice milk OR 1 cup water or juice OR 1/4 cup dry milk powder plus 1 cup water OR 2/3 cup evaporated milk plus 1/3 cup water

Molasses.substitution: Mix 3/4 cup brown sugar and 1 teaspoon cream of tartar

Mustard: prepared.substitution: Mix together 1 tablespoon dried mustard, 1 teaspoon water, 1 teaspoon vinegar and 1 teaspoon sugar

Onion.substitution: 1 cup chopped green onions OR 1 cup chopped shallots OR 1 cup chopped leeks OR 1/4 cup dried minced onion OR 1/4 cup onion powder

Orange zest.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon orange extract OR 1 teaspoon lemon juice

Parmesan cheese.substitution: 1/2 cup grated Asiago cheese OR 1/2 cup grated Romano cheese

Parsley.substitution: 1 tablespoon chopped fresh chervil OR 1 teaspoon dried parsley

Raisin.substitution: 1 cup dried currants OR 1 cup dried cranberries OR 1 cup chopped pitted prunes

Rice: white.substitution: 1 cup cooked barley OR 1 cup cooked bulgur OR 1 cup cooked brown or wild rice

Ricotta.substitution: 1 cup dry cottage cheese OR 1 cup silken tofu

Rum.substitution: 1/2 teaspoon rum extract, plus enough water to make 1 tablespoon

Semisweet chocolate chips.substitution: 1 cup chocolate candies OR 1 cup peanut butter or other flavored chips OR 1 cup chopped nuts OR 1 cup chopped dried fruit

Shallots, chopped.substitution: 1/2 cup chopped onion OR 1/2 cup chopped leek OR 1/2 cup chopped green onion

Shortening.substitution: 1 cup butter OR 1 cup margarine minus 1/2 teaspoon salt from recipe

Sour cream.substitution: 1 cup plain yogurt OR 1 tablespoon lemon juice or vinegar plus enough cream to make 1 cup OR 3/4 cup buttermilk mixed with 1/3 cup butter

Sour milk.substitution: 1 tablespoon vinegar or lemon juice mixed with enough milk to make 1 cup: Let stand 5 minutes to thicken

Soy sauce.substitution: 1/4 cup Worcestershire sauce mixed with 1 tablespoon water

Stock: beef or chicken.substitution: 1 cube beef or chicken bouillon dissolved in 1 cup water

Sweetened condensed milk.substitution: 3/4 cup white sugar mixed with 1/2 cup water and 1 1/8 cups dry powdered milk: Bring to a boil and cook, stirring frequently, until thickened, about 20 minutes

Vegetable oil (for baking).substitution: 1 cup applesauce OR 1 cup fruit puree

Vegetable oil (for frying).substitution: 1 cup lard OR 1 cup vegetable shortening

Vinegar.substitution: 1 teaspoon lemon or lime juice OR 2 teaspoons white wine

White sugar.substitution: 1 cup brown sugar OR 1 1/4 cups confectioners' sugar OR 3/4 cup honey OR 3/4 cup corn syrup

Wine.substitution: 1 cup chicken or beef broth OR 1 cup fruit juice mixed with 2 teaspoons vinegar OR 1 cup water

Yeast: active dry.substitution: 1 cake compressed yeast OR 2 1/2 teaspoons active dry yeast OR 2 1/2 teaspoons rapid rise yeast
